entry.title: How to auto-reply & send msg with telegram
entry.content:
There are many reasons as a man that you have to reply within 59 seconds, otherwise, some bad things will happen.

Luckily Telegram provides an API to do so.

  1. get your dev token in here, not bot token
  2. install telethon with pip3
  3. RTFM to make the py works

Telethon

On Catalina, it will abort immediately after import telethon without any other helpful logs which cost me all afternoon to tackle the issue

  • I tried to switch the python version with pyenv, not working
  • run it on Ubuntu, working
  • finally found in here, Python crashing on macOS 10.15, OpenSSL missing

Auto Reply

replyHer.py

Scheduled message

spamHer.py

Anyway, the list template is not powerful enough to make the dialogue live longer than 1 minute.

Her.msg -> telethon -> AI bot
Her <- telethon <- bot.msg

Might be a great solution ðŸŒšðŸŒšðŸŒš

entry.title: Uber Booking Animation
entry.content:
In June this year, I was in San Jose to join WWDC, thatâ€™s the time I saw the waiting animation when I was using Uber to meet a friend at Cupertino Library.

The animation is awe-inspiring!

Iâ€™m so curious how they did it, so I do a little bit of exploration.

Preview

Well, the polyline animation still not smooth enough. Does anyone have a better idea?

Step by Step

Rotate Map

I chose ï£¿Map as the default map to demo because of two reasons:

  • After WWDC19, Simulator build on top of Meta, Core layer under all of Appleâ€™s frameworks which MapKit included, Metal takes advantage of GPU of the underlying Mac system
  • Google Map need a developer key to get access, which means you cannot run it directly on the simulator after forking the repository from GitHub

ï£¿Map transactions can be tuned by embed in UIView.animate block.

Google Map has to use CATransaction

Pin Animation

We need two `CAShapeLayerâ€™s to do the animation, one for circle, the other for the pin.
Notice that the circle disappears after it reaches to maximum, and the pin has an easeIn curve.

Draw Polyline on map

ï£¿Map use MKMapViewDelegate to handle drawing.

Here is how to add polyline

Animate Polyline

Thatâ€™s the tricky part.

As we see Uberâ€™s animation closely enough, the polyline rotating with the map, so that draws on the map.

What I do is continuing add and remove polylines on the map to pretend itâ€™s an animation.
Also, the line has a header and a tail when appearing at the beginning and ending at the pin.

Here is the repository, if you have an any better idea, please let me know :)

Update

Well, As screen refresh rate is 60 fps, so it should make total steps/duration â‰ˆ 60
